channel.title: Project Platonic (Looking for a Team)
channel.description:
Hello! I'm looking to start my own RSPS.
First off, I am looking for a group/team of people to help me on this project.
Second, I will be paying for the website, vps, hosting, etc... When it's released.
My Skype - ProjectPlatonic
Application Format:
Your name - Your Age - How long have you played RSPS's - Any experience in server coding/client coding/websites - How much time are you willing to put into this project a week - Favorite part of RSPS's (Do you enjoy skilling, PvP, helping others?) -
Sorry for such a short post, but currently I'm about to take a nap. I'll check back on this after I wake up and get back with everyone who has applied and or comments.

item.title: Project Platonic (Looking for a Team)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“hotrock767, post:3, topic:473541”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=591475.msg4181651#msg4181651 date=1355606626]

Do you have a MSN? I’m sorry but I don’t have a Skype.

Skype and M.S.N. aren’t the same.
[/quote]
I’m well aware…thats why I’m asking him if he has a MSN or not.[/quote]

I seem to have misread your message. I apologize.

On Topic:

Good luck with your Development Team. There are better Application Formats out there you should use.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Platonic (Looking for a Team)
item.dc:creator: @hotrock767 hotrock767
item.description:
@hotrock767 wrote:

Your name - Thunder
Your Age - 17
How long have you played RSPS’s - 3-2 years
Any experience in server coding/client coding/websites - Yes
How much time are you willing to put into this project a week - Depending on the situation and my schedule, but I’ll try my best to be active.
Favorite part of RSPS’s (Do you enjoy skilling, PvP, helping others?) - Helping other players, and getting to know them.

Do you have a MSN? I’m sorry but I don’t have a Skype.

Read full topic
